experience_guidance.rule: Prohibit isolated advances or maneuvers by offensive assets (FIGHTER, AIRCRAFT, DECOY) into enemy radar/missile range without nearby allies (<=3 units) providing mutual support overlap.
experience_guidance.rationale: Systemic loss of assets due to fragmented positioning and lack of convergence, enabling enemy to engage units piecemeal without overlapping fires or evasion aid.

experience_guidance.rule: Never deploy DECOY units without paired armed overwatch (FIGHTER/AIRCRAFT within 4 units actively SHOOTing or SAM radar coverage).
experience_guidance.rationale: Decoys sacrificed unsupported, leading to offensive collapse as they advanced solo into high-threat zones without suppressive fire.

experience_guidance.rule: Prohibit static positioning of information assets (AWACS, SAM); require dynamic forward repositioning for radar layering and cueing before any offensive push.
experience_guidance.rationale: Inactive SAM radars and static AWACS caused loss of information dominance and fragmented Blue vision against centralized Red forces.

experience_guidance.rule: Avoid divergence of mobile assets across axes without rally points or tight clusters ensuring formation flying and synchronized engagements.
experience_guidance.rationale: No mutual support or concentrated volleys due to north-south splits and lack of integration between offensive/defensive elements.
